career_path.summary: This text outlines potential career paths after completing a nursing course, including roles like Nursing Incharge, Executive, Superintendent, Supervisor, and Paramedic Nurse. It also highlights that students from this program can expect an average annual package between 4.50 LPA and 6.00 LPA upon placement, encouraging individuals to pursue a career in nursing.
career_path.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
• Nursing Incharge
• Nursing Executive
• Assistant Nursing Superintendent
• Nursing Supervisor
• Paramedic Nurse
Students of this programme are placed in companies with an average annual package of 4.50 LPA to 6.00 LPA
Take the next step towards a career in nursing.
